source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_comments_fact)
- **New Data:** where a Pers_No in the source does not exist as an EmployeeNumber in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Pers_No in source and EmployeeNumber in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeNumber in the target exists but the same Pers_No doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View checkmark_reading_case_fact_new is created

%%sql  

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW checkmark_reading_case_fact_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of ReadingCaseID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T5.ReadingCaseID IS NULL
        THEN T1.ReadingCaseFactID
        ELSE NULL
    END as ReadingCaseFactID, -- surrogate 
    T5.ReadingCaseID, -- source system id
    T5.CaseLevel AS LevelReferenceID,
    TNSI.NSIID,
    T5.Source AS SourceReferenceID,
    T5.TypeOfReading AS ReadingTypeReferenceID,
    T5.ReadingStatus AS ReadingStatusReferenceID,
    T5.Procedure AS ProcedureReferenceID,
    T5.CaseReference,
    
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ReadingCaseID,'.'), IFNULL(T5.CaseLevel,'.'), IFNULL(    TNSI.NSIID,'.'), IFNULL(T5.Source,'.'),IFNULL(T5.TypeOfReading,'.'),IFNULL(T5.ReadingStatus,'.'),IFNULL(T5.Procedure,'.'),IFNULL(T5.CaseReference,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ReadingCaseID = T5.ReadingCaseID AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ReadingCaseID,'.'), IFNULL(T5.CaseLevel,'.'), IFNULL(    TNSI.NSIID,'.'), IFNULL(T5.Source,'.'),IFNULL(T5.TypeOfReading,'.'),IFNULL(T5.ReadingStatus,'.'),IFNULL(T5.Procedure,'.'),IFNULL(T5.CaseReference,'.'))) <> T5.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T5.ReadingCaseID IS NULL -- new comment
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ReadingCaseID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData, 
    T5.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_fact T1
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_dim T5 ON T1.ReadingCaseID = T5.ReadingCaseID AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_level_reference_dim TLR ON TLR.LevelReferenceID = T1.LevelReferenceID AND TLR.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_nsi_dim TNSI ON TNSI.NSIID = T1.NSIID AND TNSI.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_source_reference_dim TSR ON TSR.SourceReferenceID = T1.SourceReferenceID AND TSR.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_type_reference_dim TRTR ON TRTR.ReadingTypeReferenceID = T1.ReadingTypeReferenceID AND TRTR.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_status_reference_dim TRSR ON TRSR.ReadingStatusReferenceID = T1.ReadingStatusReferenceID AND TRSR.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_procedure_reference_dim TPR ON TPR.ProcedureReferenceID = T1.ProcedureReferenceID AND TLR.IsActive = 'Y'


WHERE
    (
        
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.ReadingCaseID = T5.ReadingCaseID AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ReadingCaseID,'.'), IFNULL(T5.CaseLevel,'.'), IFNULL(    TNSI.NSIID,'.'), IFNULL(T5.Source,'.'),IFNULL(T5.TypeOfReading,'.'),IFNULL(T5.ReadingStatus,'.'),IFNULL(T5.Procedure,'.'),IFNULL(T5.CaseReference,'.'))) <> T5.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T5.ReadingCaseID IS NULL -- new employee
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.ReadingCaseID IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )
    )

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **checkmark_reading_case_fact_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View checkmark_reading_case_fact_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW checkmark_reading_case_fact_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    ReadingCaseFactID, -- surrogate 
    ReadingCaseID, -- source system id
    LevelReferenceID,
    NSIID,
    SourceReferenceID,
    ReadingTypeReferenceID,
    ReadingStatusReferenceID,
    ProcedureReferenceID,
    CaseReference,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From checkmark_reading_case_fact_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    ReadingCaseFactID, -- surrogate 
    ReadingCaseID, -- source system id
    LevelReferenceID,
    NSIID,
    SourceReferenceID,
    ReadingTypeReferenceID,
    ReadingStatusReferenceID,
    ProcedureReferenceID,
    CaseReference,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_fact
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM checkmark_reading_case_fact_new WHERE ReadingCaseFactID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View checkmark_reading_case_fact_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table checkmark_comments_fact.employee_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_fact AS Target
USING checkmark_reading_case_fact_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.CaseReference = Target.CaseReference

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.checkmark_comments_fact is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new ReadingCaseFactID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_fact

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ReadingCaseFactID NULLS LAST) AS ReadingCaseFactID, -- surrogate key
    ReadingCaseID, -- source system id
    LevelReferenceID,
    NSIID,
    SourceReferenceID,
    ReadingTypeReferenceID,
    ReadingStatusReferenceID,
    ProcedureReferenceID,
    CaseReference,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_fact;
